text:
Cynthia Myers (September 12, 1950 – November 4, 2011) was an American actress and fashion model. She acted primarily in B-movies. She was "Playboy" Playmate of the Month in December 1968. Her most famous theatrical movie was "Beyond the Valley of the Dolls", a 1970 movie in which she starred as bisexual musician Casey Anderson.
Myers was born in Toledo, Ohio. She died due to lung cancer at age sixty-one.
